title: Ideas For Arctic Ops Concept
body:
Would love to see this concept continued in other champions, the ice animations and snow military style is so inviting and provides a modern unique spin to the champion in another light as well as something fitting to ARAM map! So far we have Varus and Kennen, how about we add Zed, Master Yi and Lucian to Arctic Ops, Just throwing it out there and would love to hear other ideas for champs in this squad and pictures if you got them! 

I also have some images found online but other fans who support this concept.

replies.body: At first I thought that nautilus was Jayce... or Poppy <3
That Nautilus skin looks really cool.
These are only pictures I found online, not my own work. But yes I would love to see that too.  I would really want to see a Zed one also! {{champion:238}}
I Absolutely love the nautilus skin, i hope its taken for consideration

arctic ops yasuo sounds cool, but looks like a midget varus with a crazy hairdoo and blade.
Nautalis skin PLEASE

> arctic ops yasuo sounds cool, but looks like a midget varus with a crazy hairdoo and blade.
> Nautalis skin PLEASE

lol

can you make one for lucian? he really needs a new skin
 and the yasuo one looks nice
the yas one looks like they just stuck arctic ops varus head on it but i like it despite that also the naut one not to sure it looks more like braum than naut if u ask me
